abstract: Black Ice: The Val James Story, autobiography by trailblazing hockey player Val James, traces the racial abuse he faced from fans and teammates as the NHL's first American-born black player; James says writing process helped him put the ugliness of the past behind him.
lead_paragraph: By writing about the abuse he endured as the league’s first American-born black player, Val James has been able to put the past’s ugliness behind him.
